body.name: X1 Wireless Gaming Headset for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PS5, PC, Mac, Nintendo Switch, Bluetooth Over Ear Gaming Headphones with Detachable Noise Canceling Microphone, 40H Battery
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 57 mins
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 57 mins
features: Wide Compatibility: Our wireless gaming headphones are equipped with both Bluetooth and 2.4G dual modes: ①. Allowing for wireless connection to Xbox controllers (Please note that the X1 Receiver only support the Official Controllers instead of the 3rd parties, and you need an extra Microsoft Adapter (Not Included) when connecting with an old version Xbox One controller) ②. as well as seamless compatibility with PC, PS5, laptops via a 2.4GHz receiver. ③. Mac and Switch supported by Bluetooth mode. Just plug and play for instant gaming immersion.

Superior Sound Quality: Immerse yourself in the game with our 50mm speakers and 3D surround sound technology. Hear every detail and experience realistic game sound effects. The noise-canceling microphone ensures clear communication with your teammates, enhancing teamwork during intense gaming sessions.

Extended Battery Life and Low Latency: Enjoy uninterrupted gaming with up to 40 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge, fully charge only need 2 hrs. Our wireless headphones feature low latency technology(＜20ms ), providing instant audio feedback without any noticeable delays, allowing for faster reactions and better gameplay.

Comfortable and Durable Design: Designed for long gaming sessions, our headphones prioritize comfort and durability. The adjustable headband and memory foam ear cushions provide a customized fit, ensuring hours of comfortable gameplay. The durable construction ensures longevity, making these headphones a reliable companion for avid gamers.

Convenient Controls: Take control of your gaming experience with easy-to-reach buttons on our headphones. Adjust the volume, mute the microphone, or control other settings directly from the headset, allowing for a seamless and effortless gaming experience.

How to activate the mic function on Xbox: ①.Connecting to the controller, enter to the interface - Click the <Settings> Choose the <General> - Click the <Volume and Audio Output> - See the <Advanced> and choose the <Audio testing & details> - Click the Volume - Enter into the Audio & music interface,then turn the <Headset mic> on. ②. Connecting to the controller, enter to the interface - Choose the <Xbox Accessories> - Click the <More Options> - Click the Volume - Enter into the Audio & music interface,then turn the <Headset mic> on.
Low battery of the xbox controller can cause insufficient power supply to the receiver, the headset might not work. Please ensure sufficient power of the controller.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1. Plug Receiver to the Xbox Controller directly. (Extra Microsoft Adapter needed (Not Included) when connect to old version controller) 2. Low battery of the controller can cause insufficient power supply to the receiver, the headset might not work. Please ensure sufficient power of the controller.

How to connect the Headset to Xbox Controller? 1. Plug the X1 Receiver to the Xbox Controller directly. (Not support the 3rd parties' controller) 2. While the Leds of the receiver flashing, please turn the headset power on. 3. Please keep the headset on 2.4GHz mode. (You could hold the Light Button to swith it to 2.4GHz or BT Mode) 4. Click the 'Xbox Accessories' option on your xbox device, makes the headset connect to it. 5. Choose the 'Volume' option and enter into the 'Audio and Music' interface to turn the headset volume and mic on.

Why the headset cannot stay connected with Xbox adapter? Low battery of the xbox controller can cause insufficient power supply to the headset receiver, the headset might lose connection. Please ensure sufficient power of the controller. Why the volume is low while connect to the Xbox? Using headphones on the controller for the first time, the default system volume might be low, and also with the monitoring mode enabled. Please adjust the volume on the Settings Interface. Can the headset be used on the 3rd parties’ controller? Please note that the headset only support official controller. Can not be used on the old version xbox controller? Please note that extra Microsoft Adapter needed (Not Included) when connect to old version controller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent audio for PC gaming - teen favorite
reviews.reviewText: Seamless connection of the headset's Bluetooth with our PC. My daughter has enjoyed playing various video games, reporting to me that she can hear more clearly the details of the game and the directions of the sounds in the game. I appreciate the headphones because I don't have to hear video game sounds in my living room anymore, lol.The light up LED definitely adds a cool factor that my teen loves. Wireless is a must for teens and this fits the bill. She claims to re-charge the battery in the headset about once a week with her playing nearly all day, every day. The battery should last even longer for those gamers who don't play all day everyday. That's a better battery performance than my Bose Bluetooth earbuds.I don't think I would have paid the original $70 that it costed, but the Amazon discount price of $49.99 was completely reasonable, making this a high-quality purchase for a reasonable price. I'm planning on getting a second headset for our family friend's son's upcoming 19th birthday next month. I guess that's my way of saying I'd recommend this headset for anyone needing a happy teenager for a reasonable price.My only CON was the delivery person, which of course doesn't reflect anything about this product. The delivery guy left this box in a bush where we couldn't see it for several days and then it rained and snowed. The packaging was soaking wet, but fortunately for us all the electronics were wrapped in plastic on the inside and nothing got damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent headset and especially for the price. It’s super comfortable, doesn’t hurt my head or ears after extended time wearing it, and the sound quality is good. I really like this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wireless Headphones at a Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I needed some wireless headphones and after reviewing all of the expensive options I couldn't afford I was able to find these. These work great and sound great and have a long battery life. I am happy that I found this option and might get another pair for my wife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Sound Quality!
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 11-year-old son. He said these headphones have great sound and that the mic works great. He likes them better than another brand he had previous.He did say he’s frustrated that when connecting the cord to his Xbox controller, it sometimes disconnects after a couple of seconds and then takes several attempts to get the cord in just the right place to keep a connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this headset for my son to use wirelessly with his Xbox one S. At first it was a little tricky to pair. Once we realize our mistake of not charging it completely, we plugged it in and it paired right away. Sounds great and fits comfortably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the Price
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product. Despite its bulky look, its quite light and the foams help soften the contact between the headphone and your ears. I appreciate how the mic is detachable since I don't always use a mic. I think this headphone will last me a couple years with this kind of quality, so its definitely worth the buck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this.
reviews.reviewText: This headset is...how do I put this nicely...hot garbage (believe me, thats putting it nicelyI don't use those words very often, but they are warranted. Maybe I got a faulty unit, I don't know. I bought this for my daughter to use with her new Xbox. Connecting is touchy at best, the headset really struggled, and it took us about 15 minutes to get it to pair without disconnecting right away. Once it was connected, you can't hear anything. Turn the volume up in every way (headset, application, you get it) and you get a whisper of sound. And by whisper, I mean you can hear something there, but the sound of pressing buttons on the controller is louder, and drowns it out. If you stop pushing buttons to listen you can enjoy blissful quiet audio until a fly next door starts buZing around. And that will drown out your headset as well. Very disappointing, especially since the kid already chucked the box, so I guess this is a $60 bundle of maybe salvageable parts. There are probably great, low cost wireless headsets out there, somewhere...this is not one of them. Buyer beware, you will be remorseful of this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with XBox
reviews.reviewText: These work great for my daughter's XBOX - the first pair we bought from another brand did not pair to this console, but these worked perfectly for her. She loves the ease of setting them up and how comfortable they are. Definitely happy with her purchase!
